name: Santa's Blitz
description:
This game is in development, made for the "Secret Santa Jam".

The purpose of the game is try to guess what the children from all over the world  might want from you, Santa Claus, in the shortest time possible.

How to play:

You just have to press on the toy that you think the child might want. You can understand it watching the letter that he sent to you. You will see a postcard where there will be the toys that he alredy has, which they will be different and with different colors. But one combination will be missing! Found it and give it away to the little child! (If you want to know more about the rules, you can search the famouse card game ghost blitz, which I was inspired by).

All the graphics, animation and code is made by me. The original idea of the gameplay is in the game, but there are a lot of details missing, which I hope to insert as soon as possible.
